message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $100. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $98. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
